Affect Target.name: promote
Affect Target.description: commanderize 0 = do not alter commander status 1 = turns a non commander into a commander

Affect Target.name: makestationary
Affect Target.description: (makes target unit stationary on world map)

Affect Target.name: makenhwound
Affect Target.description: (gives target unit a never healing wound)

Affect Target.name: changeowner
Affect Target.description: changes ownership of unit to this player

Basic Action.name: addresources
Basic Action.description: Adds an amount of resources to a player. See table Resource Types for resource types.

Basic Action.name: message
Basic Action.description: Sends a text message to a player.

Change Location.name: setloc
Change Location.description: move target location to a fixed location

Change Location.name: randloc
Change Location.description: move target location to a random location. See table Plane Numbers. The plane special values -1 (all planes) and -2 (Elysium-near planes) can also be used. Negative terrain numbers can also be used for special group of terrains.

Change Location.name: scatterloc
Change Location.description: makes target location deviate a bit can result in the same square. Cannot be used on squareevents

Start.name: playerevent
Start.description: Once for each player every turn occurs in home citadel by default

Start.name: squareevent
Start.description: For each player and each square in the world every turn

Start.name: endevent
Start.description: All events must end with this command

Target Action.name: alterterrain
Target Action.description: changes the terrain of the current location

Target Action.name: namesquare
Target Action.description: Sets name of square e.g. 'Crab Harbor' or '!2The Old Forest' or '!!The Old Tower'

Trigger.name: +squareowner
Trigger.description: True if target square is owned or occupied by this player

Trigger.name: +armyowner
Trigger.description: True if square is occupied by this player

Trigger.name: +turnnbr
Trigger.description: True if the current turn number is this turn nbr.

Trigger.name: +minturnnbr
Trigger.description: True if the current turn number is this turn nbr of greater.

Trigger.name: +chance
Trigger.description: Trigger has percent chance of being true.

Trigger.name: +player
Trigger.description: True if current player has this player number

Trigger.name: +class
Trigger.description: True if this player is this class

Trigger.name: +hascom
Trigger.description: Also sets target unit

Trigger.name: +hascomhere
Trigger.description: Also sets target unit

Trigger.name: +ownsloc
Trigger.description: True if player owns this terrain anywhere in the world

Trigger.name: +terrain
Trigger.description: True if target square is of this terrain

Trigger.name: +season
Trigger.description: 0=summer 1=autumn 2=winter 3=spring

Trigger.name: +seasondelay
Trigger.description: 3=early (guaranteed to only happen once per season 2=mid 1=late)

Trigger.name: +varequal
Trigger.description: var = 0-9999 true if variable equals value

Trigger.name: +varlesser
Trigger.description: True if the variable is less than value

Trigger.name: +vargreater
Trigger.description: True if the variable is greater than value

Trigger.name: +hasunit
Trigger.description: Also sets target unit (player -1 = any player)

Trigger.name: +hasunithere
Trigger.description: Also sets target unit (player -1 = any player)

Trigger.name: +squarename
Trigger.description: True if square has this name. e.g. 'Crab Harbor' or 'The Old Tower'

Trigger.name: +plane
Trigger.description: True if target square is on this plane. See table Plane Numbers. The special values -1 (all planes) and -2 (Elysium-near planes) can also be used.

Variable.name: setvar
Variable.description: var = 0-9999  sets a variable to a value

Variable.name: addvar
Variable.description: var = 0-9999  adds a value to a variable.
